mapper.select: SELECT userId, userPw FROM community_member WHERE userId = #{userId} and userPw = #{userPw}
SELECT m.userId, m.userPw, ifnull(count(c.userId), 0) AS count FROM community_member AS m LEFT OUTER JOIN community AS c ON m.userId = c.userId GROUP BY m.userId, m.userPw
SELECT m.userId, m.userPw, cnt.count FROM community_member AS m, (SELECT count(*) AS count FROM community WHERE userId = #{userId}) AS cnt WHERE userId = #{userId}
